Package p4_group_8_repo.actor

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
p4_group_8_repo.actor.Actor
p4_group_8_repo.actor.Animal
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Animal
extends Actor
Represents the protagonist in the game play.
Author:
Liew Yih Seng

  • Constructor Details

    • Animal

      public Animal()
      Construct an instance of animal that acts as the protagonist in the game play.

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act​(long now)
      Determine how this animal should act during game play. It will invoke various method such as setHeightBound(), setLeftBound(), setRightBound(), setCarDeathAnimation(long), setWaterDeath(boolean) and setCrashObstacle() to set the reaction of this animal on certain limitation. Then it will perform several if else test to check if this animal has intersected with any of the Actor class objects. This method will be invoked during every clock tick checking for the suitable actions to be set on the animal.
      Specified by:
      act in class Actor
      Parameters:
      now - A long integer representing the current clock tick.

    • setHeightBound

      public void setHeightBound()
      Setting the height bound of the game play where this animal will always be kept within the screen of size 600 x 800 (W x H) by invoking the method Actor.setCoordinate(int, int) that resets the position of this animal back to the initial starting point if by any chance it crossed the border.

    • setLeftBound

      public void setLeftBound()
      Sets the left bound of the game play at X-coordinate of 0. Where this animal will be move back into the screen if it touches the left bound by invoking the Actor.move(double, double) method.

    • setRightBound

      public void setRightBound()
      Sets the right bound of the game play at X-coordinate of 600. Where this animal will be move back into the screen if it touches the right bound by invoking the Actor.move(double, double) method.

    • setCarDeathAnimation

      public void setCarDeathAnimation​(long now)
      A method that checks if this animal's death is caused by crashing onto an obstacle. If the test condition returns true, it invokes the deathLoopAnimation(long) which triggers the change of car death animation in the method carDeathAnimation().
      Parameters:
      now - A long integer that represents the current clock tick.

    • setWaterDeathAnimation

      public void setWaterDeathAnimation​(long now)
      A method that checks if this animal's death is caused by drowning in water. If the test condition returns true, it invokes the deathLoopAnimation(long) which triggers the change of water death animation in the method waterDeathAnimation().
      Parameters:
      now - A long integer that represents the current clock tick.

    • setCrashObstacle

      public void setCrashObstacle()
      A method that sets the death of this animal to car crash if the test condition using method Actor.getIntersectingObjects(Class) states that the animal has intersected with an Obstacle class object returns true.

    • getStop

      public boolean getStop​(int level)
      Gets the number of ends in a level.
      Parameters:
      level - An integer representing the current level of the user.
      Returns:
      A boolean that is used to trigger a stop between level switching.

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Gets the number of points in the current game.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the points of user in the current game.

    • setPoints

      public void setPoints​(int points)
      Sets the number of points in the current game.
      Parameters:
      points - An integer representing the current point of user in the game.

    • isSecond

      public boolean isSecond()
      Determine whether this animal is at its second jump animation.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing the jump state of this animal.

    • setSecond

      public void setSecond​(boolean second)
      Sets the jump state animation of this animal.
      Parameters:
      second - A boolean representing if this animal's animation is at the second jump state.

    • isCarDeath

      public boolean isCarDeath()
      Gets if the death type is by hitting an obstacle.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing whether the death is by hitting an obstacle.

    • setCarDeath

      public void setCarDeath​(boolean carDeath)
      Sets the death type to car death (hitting an obstacle).
      Parameters:
      carDeath - A boolean stating if the death type is car death (hitting an obstacle).

    • isWaterDeath

      public boolean isWaterDeath()
      Gets if the death type is by water.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing whether the death is by water.

    • setWaterDeath

      public void setWaterDeath​(boolean waterDeath)
      Sets the death type to water death.
      Parameters:
      waterDeath - A boolean stating if the death type is water death.

    • changeScore

      public boolean changeScore()
      Trigger score change in gameScene's score counter.
      Returns:
      A boolean stating the necessity to change score.

    • carDeathAnimation

      public void carDeathAnimation()
      Displays the animation of this animal being crashed by a car(obstacle) as clock ticks.

    • waterDeathAnimation

      public void waterDeathAnimation()
      Displays the animation of this animal drowning in the water as clock ticks.

    • deathScoreDecrement

      public void deathScoreDecrement​(int points)
      Decrement in the score if this animal is dead.
      Parameters:
      points - An integer representing the current point of the user.

    • respawn

      public void respawn​(int deathType)
      Sets the respawn point of this animal when it dies.
      Parameters:
      deathType - An integer representing the death type of this animal.

    • deathLoopAnimation

      public void deathLoopAnimation​(long now)
      Process the clock tick to change the death animation of this animal.
      Parameters:
      now - A long integer representing the clock tick.

    • frogMovementImg

      public javafx.scene.image.Image frogMovementImg​(String imageName)
      Sets the image of the current animal movement.
      Parameters:
      imageName - A string that represents the current animal movement.
      Returns:
      An image of the current animal movement.

    • moveLocationDisplay

      public void moveLocationDisplay​(double xpos, double ypos, javafx.scene.image.Image img)
      Sets the location of this animal after the jump and it corresponding image animation.
      Parameters:
      xpos - A double that represents the coordinate of X-axis of this animal.
      ypos - A double that represents the coordinate of Y-axis of this animal.
      img - The corresponding image of this animal after the jump.

    • setDeathAniImg

      public void setDeathAniImg​(String imageName)
      Sets the image for the death animation of this animal.
      Parameters:
      imageName - A String that represents the name of the image.

    • DeathAnimationImg

      public javafx.scene.image.Image DeathAnimationImg​(String imageName)
      Retrieves the image of death animation from the project directory.
      Parameters:
      imageName - A string that represents the name of the image.
      Returns:
      An image that corresponds to the imageName and the current phase of death animation of this animal.
